teal.sim.spatial

Class RelativeFLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • teal.core.AbstractElement
      • teal.render.Rendered
        • teal.sim.SimRendered
          • teal.sim.engine.EngineRendered
            • teal.sim.spatial.Spatial
              • teal.sim.spatial.SpatialField
                • teal.sim.spatial.FieldLine
                  • teal.sim.spatial.RelativeFLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, HasID, HasReference, Referenced, TElement, THasPropertyChange, HasBoundingArea, HasColor, HasDirection, HasFog, HasNode3D, HasPosition, HasRotation, IsMoveable, IsPickable, TAbstractRendered, TDrawable, TRendered, HasSimEngine, IsSpatial, TSimElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RadiationFieldLine

    public class RelativeFLine
extends FieldLine
implements HasReference
    Relative field lines use the internal position variable somewhat differently than most of the HasPosition classes, position is an offset from the element associated with the fieldlines position, if there is no element it will be absolute. Access should always be through the getter & setter.
    Author:
    Phil Bailey - Center for Educational Computing Initiatives / MIT
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
